BlackNightmare:

BlackNightmare arrived where Malice was, she with a kindly smile 
said "Good morning, Malice... How do you feel?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague/ Splattercannon/ Malice:
>  
> "Very well.  We will need much, his EPS grid will need a lot to 
fully energize."
> Hellplague steps out of the room and contacts Splattercannon.
> "Meet me in the southern annex.  We have a lot of energon to 
carry."
> "I will be there." the Silent one said.
> Hellplague transformed and took off for the southern annex, where 
a large store of energon awaits.
>  
> ~Twenty minutes later~
>  
> Minutes after Hellplague left, shudders pass though the form of he 
great hunter.  His fingers twitch, arms barely move.  All he feels 
is cold and blackness... and for the first time in his long life, 
fear.
> "... hello?  It's so cold, it drains the life from me.  Someone... 
help me..."
>  
>  
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Blacknightmare::
> 
> "Bring some to him and me... we will need it and wer have to say 
> cheers... for the new Unicron servant"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Hellplague:
> >  
> > "I totally altered his behavior.  He is as evil and twisted as 
we 
> are, sister.  He will be compelled to stay, he is a Minion also." 
> Hellplague said, closing Malice's chest panel and getting off the 
> bed.
> > "I'm going to get some energon.  Stay with him in case he wakes 
up 
> before I return."
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > BlackNightmare:
> > 
> > "Exist a way to prevent that he ran away in case that 
brainwashing 
> > fails"said the4 femme
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Hellplague:
> > >  
> > > "There is always a chance that it will fail.  I am the best 
and 
> I 
> > did everything I could.  But what brainwashing deals with is a 
> bunch 
> > of unknowns."
> > > The grin faded a little, then Hellplague opened Malice's chest 
> > panel.  She put her finger on a small Autobot insignia then 
looked 
> > up at Blacknightmare.
> > > "See this?  It's a raised stamp that is on all Autobot spark 
> > chamber panels.  But watch this."
> > > The Sweep commander picked at the raised portion until it came 
> > off, revealing a depression with a Decepticon symbol etched in 
it.
> > > "He wasn't lying when he said he was the brother of Megatron.  
> His 
> > serial number, internal chronometer, it all matches.  He is the 
> > younger brothr of Megatron, so there's no telling what he is 
> > capable.  But we have him, it is highly unlikely that he will 
> escape 
> > my brainwashing."
> > > 
> > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > BlackNightmare:
> > > 
> > > "I don't know how say this... exist any chance that he 
overcome 
> > > brain washing?"said the femme while she looked him
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
> <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > Hellplague:
> > > >  
> > > > The femmes hoisted the bounty hunter off the table.  They 
> carry 
> > > him as best they can back to his intial room and lay him on 
the 
> > > table.  Hellplague removed the weights on Malice's arms and 
> legs.  
> > > She removes the sensor on his body, but puts one on his 
chest.  
> It 
> > > is connected to her comm link, so she may be in contact if 
there 
> > is 
> > > a problem with his re- activation.
> > > > "Now we wait.  See if an hour will revive him.  Our little 
> > > monster..." she said with a grin, all the while sitting on the 
> bed 
> > > and carressing the hunter's face.
> > > > 
> > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > BlackNightmare:
> > > > 
> > > > BlackNightmare took the other side and waited to Hellplague 
> > signal
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
> > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > Hellplague:
> > > > >  
> > > > > "I couldn't erase his memory, only software.  Who ever 
> created 
> > > > this body for him must have reformatted his memory core, 
it's 
> > > > heavily encrypted and the data is so inter connected, simply 
> > > erasing 
> > > > anything would turn him into a protoform.  It would erase 
> > > > everything.  But don't worry, I modified his behavior, we 
> won't 
> > > have 
> > > > any problems with him, even if he can get past the block I 
put 
> > on 
> > > > them."
> > > > > The Sweep commande pulled Malice to were he was siting up, 
> and 
> > > > pulled one arm around her shoulders.  She pulled him to the 
> edge 
> > > of 
> > > > the table and waited Blacknightmare to get his other side.
> > > > > 
> > > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:

> > > > > 
> > > > > "To a bed..."said the femme"Did you erase and modified his 
> > > > memories?"
